lead_paragraph: The winner of this month’s British Open will receive $1.5 million, making it the richest prize in any major. The Royal and Ancient Golf Club said the winner of the July 19-22 tournament in Carnoustie, Scotland, would earn $60,460 more than Tiger Woods did when he won at Royal Liverpool last year. The total purse for this British Open will be $8.5 million, an increase of $403,000.
